title: Engineering Transparency & Delivery Platform
description: Standardized Jira and Azure DevOps taxonomies to unify reporting across teams. Delivered KPI dashboards with throughput, velocity, and SLA metrics, enabling traceability from strategic themes to work items.

title: CRM & Revenue Lifecycle Modernization
impact: Standardized revenue processes and improved conversion insights
description: Unified Salesforce, Dynamics, and ServiceNow into a single CRM and sales platform post-M&A. Automated Lead → Opportunity → Quote workflows with embedded guardrails and surfaced pipeline performance through dashboards.

title: Segra360 – Unified Customer Portal
impact: Reduced customer support volume by 40% through self-service
description: Directed the 0-to-1 launch of Segra360, a secure self-service portal integrating billing, orders, service status, and usage. Implemented OAuth2, OIDC, and MFA while embedding analytics to improve engagement and product roadmap insights.

title: SegraMaps – Data Visualization Platform
description: Developed SegraMaps, a geospatial visualization system integrated with CRM. Enabled faster network qualification and pricing decisions through interactive maps and workflow integration.

title: Cloud & Platform Migrations
impact: Improved scalability, security, and agility of enterprise systems
description: Led modernization programs including Dynamics 365 CRM migration to Azure and portal replatforming to ServiceNow. Refactored legacy code, integrated serverless services, and enabled Power Apps adoption.

title: Workflow & Contract Automation
impact: Reduced approval and contract cycle times
description: Implemented workflow engines with embedded economics guardrails, automated contract generation, and integrated e-signature. Reduced policy drift and accelerated execution while improving compliance.

title: Location Validation & Data Quality Services
impact: Enhanced data quality and eliminated duplicates
description: Built validation services integrating Dynamics, ESRI, and MuleSoft to improve address accuracy, prevent duplication, and enable accurate network site modeling.

title: Business Proposal Platform
impact: Accelerated proposal generation and improved consistency
description: Created a branded proposal generation system with automated document assembly. Reduced manual coordination between marketing and sales and improved turnaround speed.

title: Interactive Resume / Portfolio Site
description: Built a personal portfolio site with React/Vite, featuring SEO metadata, dark mode, filtered project views, and a print-optimized layout. Deployed via GitHub Pages with automated CI/CD pipelines.

title: Portfolio Builder SaaS Prototype
impact: Enabled rapid creation of professional digital portfolios
description: Developed a SaaS prototype that simplifies building shareable portfolios with Stripe-based monetization, webhook persistence, and automated testing. Delivered production-grade reliability through CI/CD and containerized deployment.

title: Automated Testing Framework
impact: Improved reliability of feature rollouts through regression testing
description: Implemented a Selenium-based end-to-end regression test suite. Integrated tests into Azure DevOps pipelines to validate new features and prevent regressions during releases.
